casebody.data:
York et al., Appellants and Cross-Appellees, v. Mayfield Neurological Institute, Inc. et al., Appellees and Cross-Appellants.

[Cite as York v. Mayfield Neurological Inst., Inc. (2000), 88 Ohio St.3d 1230.]

(No. 99-924 Submitted February 9, 2000 Decided March 29, 2000.) Holbrook & Jonson Co., L.P.A., Michael D. Shanks and Timothy R. Evans, for appellants and cross-appellees. *1231Taft, Stettinius & Hollister, L.L.P., James M. Hall, Jr., and Marcia V. Andreiv; Rendigs, Fry, Kiely & Dennis, L.L.P., and David W. Peck, for appellees and cross-appellants.

The cause is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently allowed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
